title: Exit Point
description: — Complex and balanced…clearly a novel from a writer who loves his work and is dedicated to the craft.In a dark Los Angeles of the near future, people are dazzled by technology and driven by an insatiable demand for virtual excitement. Suddenly, something strange is happening. An enigmatic genius discovers it. A woman obsessed with power exploits it. One man will risk everything to find the answer behind it, but could never have been prepared for where truth would take him…
author: Michael Jeffery Blair
